SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "accounts" WHERE "accounts"."domain" IN (SELECT "instances"."domain" FROM "instances" WHERE (reverse(? || domain) LIKE reverse(?)))

SELECT axis.*, ( WITH new_accounts AS ( SELECT accounts.id FROM accounts WHERE date_trunc(?, accounts.created_at)::date = axis.period AND accounts.domain IN (SELECT domain FROM instances WHERE reverse(? || domain) LIKE reverse(? || ?::text)) ) SELECT count(*) FROM new_accounts ) AS value FROM ( SELECT generate_series(date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, interval ?) AS period ) AS axis
